import {cx} from "emotion";
import React from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
import PropTypesExtra from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
 
import getChildren from "../utils/children";
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
import cloneElement from "../utils/clone";
import EventEmitter from "../../event-emitter";
 
import {Icon} from "./icon";
import {Label} from "./label"; 
 
import getNavmenuStyle from "../styles/navmenu/navmenu.style";
import getNavmenuItemStyle from "../styles/navmenu/navmenu-item.style";
import getNavmenuBadgeStyle from "../styles/navmenu/navmenu-badge.style";
 
// const numbers = "zero,one,two,three,four,five,six,seven,eight,nine,ten,eleven,twelve,thirteen,fourteen,fifteen,sixteen".split(",");
 
 
class RouterListener extends EventEmitter {
  constructor(router) {
    super();
    router.addRoute("*",(ctx,next)=>{
      this.emit("routechange",ctx);
      next();
    });
  }
}
 
export function NavMenuItem(props) {
 
  const {
    truncateText,
    active,
    icon,
    badge,
    inverted,
    badgeProps: _badgeProps,
    children: _children,
    variation,
    size,
    component,
    ...otherProps
  } = props;
 
 
  let children = React.Children.toArray(_children);
 
  const styleFlags = {
    active,
    truncateText,
    withBadge: !(badge == null || badge === false),
    inverted,
  };
 
  Iif (truncateText) {
    children = (
      <span
        style={{
          overflow: "hidden",
          textOverflow: "ellipsis",
          whiteSpace: "nowrap",
          maxWidth: "100%",
        }}
      >
        {children}
      </span>
    );
  }
 
  Eif (icon) {
    const iconContent = (
      <i className="cm-navmenu-icon" key="icon">
        <Icon icon={icon} />
      </i>
    );
 
    children = [iconContent,children];
 
  }
 
  if (badge != null && badge !== false) {
    const badgeProps = mergeProps({
      className: cx("cm-navmenu-badge",getNavmenuBadgeStyle(styleFlags,variation,size)),
      circular: true,
      key: "badge",
    },_badgeProps);
 
    children.push(
      <Label {...badgeProps}>{badge}</Label>
    );
 
  }
 
  const newProps = mergeProps({
    className: cx("cm-navmenu-item",getNavmenuItemStyle(styleFlags,variation,size)),
  },otherProps);
 
  return React.createElement(component,newProps,children);
}
 
NavMenuItem.propTypes = {
  active: PropTypes.bool,
  icon: PropTypesExtra.icon,
  children: PropTypes.node,
  badge: PropTypes.node,
  inverted: PropTypes.bool,
  badgeProps: PropTypes.object,
  component: PropTypesExtra.component,
  truncateText: PropTypes.bool,
  href: PropTypes.string,
  variation: PropTypesExtra.variation,
  size: PropTypes.string,
};
 
NavMenuItem.defaultProps = {
  component: "a",
  href: "#",
};
 
 
 
export class NavMenu extends React.Component {
 
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.state = {};
  }
 
  componentDidMount() {
    this.checkRouter();
  }
 
  componentDidUpdate() {
    this.checkRouter();
  }
 
  componentWillUnmount() {
    this.detachRouter();
  }
 
  detachRouter = ()=>{
    Iif (this.router) {
      this.router._menuEmitter.off("routechange",this.routeChange);
    }
  }
 
  checkRouter = ()=>{
    Iif (this.props.router) {
      if (!this.router) {
        this.router = this.props.router;
        if (!this.router._menuEmitter) {
          this.router._menuEmitter = new RouterListener(this.router);
        }
        this.router._menuEmitter.on("routechange",this.routeChange);
        this.setState({currentPath: this.router.getCurrentPath()});
      }
    }
    else {
      this.detachRouter();
    }
  }
 
  routeChange = (ctx)=>{
    this.setState({currentPath: ctx.path});
  }
 
  render() {
 
    const {
      inverted,
      children: _children,
      component,
      variation,
      router,
      size,
      truncateText,
      ...otherProps
    } = this.props;
 
    const styleFlags = {
      inverted,
      truncateText,
    };
 
  
 
    const children = getChildren(this).map((child,i)=>{
      const childPath = child.props.href && child.props.href.replace("#","");
      return cloneElement(child,{
        active: child.props.active == null ? (childPath === this.state.currentPath) : child.props.active,
        inverted,
        variation,
        key: `navItem${i}`,
        truncateText,
      });
    });
 
    const newProps = mergeProps({
      className: cx("cm-navmenu",getNavmenuStyle(styleFlags,variation,size)),
    },otherProps);
 
 
    
 
    return React.createElement(component,newProps,children);
 
  }
}
 
NavMenu.propTypes = {
  router: PropTypes.object,
  inverted: PropTypes.bool,
  variation: PropTypesExtra.variation,
  component: PropTypesExtra.component,
  size: PropTypes.string,
  children: PropTypes.node,
  truncateText: PropTypes.bool,
};
 
NavMenu.defaultProps = {
  component: "nav",
};
